name: Pocket Wars Saga
description:
An epic journey through the most dangerous adventure of all times. Who will dare to fight the treacherous hazards among POCKET WARS? It could be you!!! Look for all the bravery inside your heart and face these evil enemies... anyways you won't succeed, the super immortal extra colossal shaman is undefeatable...

This game features:

- 27 different heroes to complete this awesome journey!
- 100 levels
- 27 dangerous enemys
- Upgradable characters
- 27 items to make your heroes more powerful!
- Amazing soundtracks
- Achievements
- And a lot more!

All this completely free so you should at least try it!

We hope all our players have a lot of fun, ask for anything you would like to see in future updates and you will have it!

Have fun completing POCKET WARS!!
